headline.main: First in the Nation Forum: Mike Huckabee

snippet: It was not for a lack of trying, but Mike Huckabee only received modest applause from a crowd that may have been a bit fatigued as the afternoon wore on and the candidates kept coming.
abstract: It was not for a lack of trying, but Mike Huckabee only received modest applause from a crowd that may have been a bit fatigued as the afternoon wore on and the candidates kept coming.
